# Changelog

All notable changes to `robots-txt` will be documented in this file

## 1.0.3 - 2019-03-11

- fix parsing robotstxt urls with keywords (#14)

## 1.0.2 - 2019-01-11

- make robots.txt check case insensitive

## 1.0.1 - 2018-05-07

- prevent exception if the domain has no robots.txt

## 1.0.0 - 2018-05-07

- initial release
